text: hey hey TBS I'm Chaz with Shazam Clark
and I'm chasing my dreams all thanks to
my HBCU Florida Agricultural and
Mechanical University
I graduated from fmu this past spring
with not only one but two degrees one in
Theater Performing Arts and the other in
Business Administration these may seem
like two different worlds but together
they make my dreams come true my HBCU
has pushed me to do great things from
serving as the king of orange and green
to performing on and off stage and even
being a part of the 2021 inaugural class
of rising future makers FAMU has
definitely saved me into the businessman
performer and change maker that I am
today so what's next for me
well I'm actually writing a musical
right now and the music you're hearing
is from that Musical
I'm all the time but TBS please select
me and help me to continue chasing my
dreams
